infobox.Japanese title:: 会社解散パーティー  (Kaisha Kaisan Pātī)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi
infobox.Animation director:: Masatomo Sudo, Seiji Muta, and Nobuyuki Iwai (supervisors)  Michitaka Yamamoto
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Nobuyuki Iwai (sub-character)  Hiroshi Ogawa (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Yusuke Tonozaki as Male employee  Ai Yamamoto as Female employee  Sho Okumura as Police officer  Jun Konno as Jiro Kureno  Taiten Kusunoki as Junnosuke Toda  Kosuke Toriumi as Hiroo Kamijou  Jin Domon as Eiji Koshimoto  Eriko Nakamura as Mayu Narita

sections.Situation:
Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are eating at a restaurant. At the same moment, in the restaurant's private room, a company is having dissolution party. But after giving a speech, the company president, Jiro Kureno falls dead onto the floor.

After the interrogatory, Eiji Koshimoto, merchandise manager and former college of the president went to the toilet, but he did not come back. Later, a waitress finds Koshimoto strangled with a suicide note in his body.

sections.Resolution:
- Junnosuke Toda talked with Conan after having a phone call and gave a toy car to him
- A waitress claimed that she was being played with Hiroo Kamijo by saying that she's the type of girl he likes.
sections.Trivia: - Mayu Narita only has her eyes open when she kills Koshimoto.
